name: Electrone Americas Ltd Co
overview:
Electrone Americas Ltd Co. provides quality IT products like industrial keyboards, payment terminals and services including a wide range of solutions to meet customer’s demands. They can deliver a range of specialized software applications to help people with their data and compliance challenges in today’s changing business environment.

Electrone Americas Ltd Co. has been solving their customers IT problems for over 20 years. From their beginnings as suppliers of IT peripherals such as self service kiosk, numeric keypads, payment terminals and industrial keyboards that solved specialist data input problems. The company specializes in custom-built, problem solving IT peripherals, for a broad range of vertical markets. The majority of Electrone’s customers are IT resellers and systems integrators.
